value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily
value.excerpt: In today's video I am collaborating with Imke Feldmann to bring you the best that M or Power Query has to offer.  We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports. value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible
